UserBody.description: User interface used just for create a user

ChallengeBody.description:
Data that can be edited or inserted. Other are edited by 
another endpoints

author.description: author is required for a challenge creation

is_privated.description: if committee allow to user choose solution privacity
if committee allow to user choose solution privacity

team_name.description: is used if the modality is equal to TEAM

participation.description:
Participation defines the type of intervention 
that the creator chose to make the proposal.
- It can be TEAM: then the creator plus the guests, form a team
- It can be INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP: then the creator will be the author and the guests will be co-authors
the interpretation depends on the value in chosen_mode

externalUser.description: External User. If true is external user that has participation in OpenChallenges

areaVisible.description: Area that is visible for user

points.description: Resume: Points earned for participation in platform.

insertedBy.description:
When the inserted user is not same that author user. 
Used for committe (Committe integrants has 
a Functionality for add generator's challenge)

updatedBy.description: User that did the last change

author.description:
Generator that create the solution. 
This field exclusive with team configuration

coauthor.description:
field that is combined with author 
when participationModeChosen = "INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP"

team.description:
Field that is filled when participationModeChosen = "TEAM"
This field exclusive with author and coauthor configuration

description.description: Situation description. Could be a challenge or description of an identified problem.

active.description:
Flag that indicate if a solution is active.
When a challenge is delete, the flag is false

groupValidator.description: Group that do the analysis about the situation

status.description: Challenge | Problem | Solution Status: @TODO define situation challenge

fileComplementary.description: Complementary files to challenge, solution or problem

canShowDisagreement.description:
Can those responsible express their disagreement? 
It affects an attribute in the Barema that indicates 
if the person responsible for the solution agrees or 
disagrees with the rating.

canFixDisapprovedIdea.description:
Can managers make corrections after disapproving an idea? 
Affects the ability to update the solution for a solution 
status = REJECTED

canChooseScope.description:
Can the generator choose the privacy of the solution 
(if it goes to the park or directly to the committee)?
Affects the scope_chosed attribute.
If can_chosose_scope = true, then the maintainer 
can edit is_privated (otherwise, the default value goes)

isPrivated.description: if committee allow to user choose solution privacity

canChooseWSALevel.description: Determines if the user can edit the WSALevel_chosed.

WSALevelAvailable.description:
WorkSpaceAvailable.
If the situation is available for all company or just for some areas.

WSALevelChosed.description:
Space for which the resource is available. 
It can be One. 
It is chosen by the person in charge of the situation

areasAvailable.description: Areas available. Is used if WSALevel = AREA because a situation isn't available for all Company. Just for some areas.

participationModeAvailable.description:
How can you participate in the proposal of a solution?
- INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP - TEAM

participationModeChosed.description:
How does the person in charge participate? 
Works in combination with 
participation_mode_available

externalContributionAvailableForGenerato.description:
Are invitations to external contributors 
by generators allowed? 
affects whether authors, co-authors, 
and teams can be made up of externals. 
If the scope is at the COMPANY level, 
and this option is equal to true, 
then the author or creator of the team can 
invite people from outside the organization.

externalContributionAvailableForCommitte.description:
Are invitations to external contributors 
by the committee allowed? affects whether authors, 
co-authors, and teams can be made up of externals. 
If the scope is at the COMPANY level, 
and this option is equal to true, 
then the author or creator of the team can invite 
people from outside the organization.

challengeId.description: Id that uniquely identifies a challenge

isStrategic.description: If challenge response to strategic organization need.

finalization.description: Challenge finalization. Time limit for submit Ideas.

canShowDisagreement.description:
Can those responsible express their disagreement? 
Affects an attribute in the Scale that indicates 
if the person responsible for the solution agrees 
or disagrees with the rating.

canFixDisapprovedIdea.description:
¿Pueden los responsables hacer correcciones 
después de desaprobar una idea? 
Afecta a la posibilidad de hacer un update sobre la 
solucion para el estado de solucion = REJECTED

canChooseScope.description:
Can the generator choose the privacy of the solution? 
Affects the scope_chosed attribute. If can_chosose_scope = true, 
then the maintainer can edit is_privated 
(otherwise, the default value goes)

canChooseWSALevel.description: Determines if the user can choose the WSALevel_chosed.

WSALevelAvailable.description:
Space that the user can have to propose a resource. 
Affects the WSALevel_chosed (the user selects among those allowed).
Affects the publication of the challenge, solutions 
and problem statement

communityCanSeeReactions.description:
The number of reactions a solution has can be seen. 
Affects the solution: the reactions achieved can be seen

maximumDontUnderstand.description:
What is the maximum number of negative 
reactions of this type that can be had?

minimumLikes.description: What is the minimum number of likes you must have to continue?

reactionFilter.description:
Used in the square, it indicates 
if a limit is established on the reactions. 
Enable choices made: minimum_likes, 
maximum_dont_understand

externalContributionAvailableForGenerato.description:
Are invitations to external contributors allowed by generators? 
affects whether authors, co-authors, 
and teams can be made up of externals. 
If the scope is at the COMPANY level, and this option is equal to true, 
then the author or creator of the team can invite people 
from outside the organization.

externalContributionAvailableForCommitte.description:
¿Están permitidas invitaciones a contribuidores externos 
por parte del comite? afecta si autores, 
coautores y equipos pueden estar conformados por externos. 
Si el alcance en a nivel de COMPANY, y esta opcion es igual a true, 
entonces el autor o creador del equipo, puede invitar 
personas de afuera de la organización.

participationModeAvailable.description: How can you participate in the proposal of a solution?

situationConfig.description: Could be CHALLENGE, SOLUTION or PROBLEM

disagreementDefault.description:
Default value. In case the user cannot choose, 
this attribute is taken as the chosen value

isPrivateDefault.description:
Default value. In case the user cannot choose, 
this attribute is taken as the chosen value

WSALevelDefault.description:
Default value. 
In case the user cannot choose, 
this attribute is taken as the chosen value

post.description: Create a new Team for a challenge or situation

Endpoint for add or reeplace a leader of committe.
The new leader have to be a `general commite` user first

Endpoint used for add a new integrant to committe. 
User could be a new integrant or old integrant with active=false
